title: RAM Usage: Legacy client vs Open beta client
body: So I am trying to install LoL on my old computer after it was reformatted. I am just asking, what client uses more ram is it the old client or the new client (open beta)???

replies.body: On my machine the legacy client uses about 450 MB of ram, where the beta uses about 300MB of ram. Keep in mind I have animations turned off on the beta client
Thanks. I will try it later.

Resource usage will vary a bit, depending on animation and sound settings, along with how much you use the social bar. You'll have to test both to see what works for you, but I've seen pretty equal memory usage for both clients when I've played.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thanks. I will reply later once I tried it.
